subject: Re: Getting started with a Quikscript blog (was: Re: [Read_Alphabet] regional accents)
msgSnippet: Thanks for that. I give it a go. I had to agree with your thoughts about Facebook and Twitter. On Thursday, 14 November 2013 10:09 AM, Nathan Sharfi
messageBody:
Thanks for that. I give it a go. I had to agree with your thoughts about Facebook and Twitter.


On Thursday, 14 November 2013 10:09 AM, Nathan Sharfi <bonusfrogs@...> wrote:
On Nov 12, 2013, at 7:34 PM, Hugh Ekeberg <weshdim@...> wrote:

> Thanks for the blog link. I'll see if I can get a blog to work in Quickscipt too.

If you have any trouble — any at all — please do ask on the list. I'd be more than happy to help, even though ideas for blog posts tend to be few and far between. (The last idea I had involved how well Abbots Morton Experiment was progressing…)

Some things that might help going in:

- My general SCSS*: http://www.frogorbits.com/CSS/all.scss

- My QS-specific SCSS: http://www.frogorbits.com/CSS/qs.scss

- The Font Squirrel Webfont Generator: http://www.fontsquirrel.com/tools/webfont-generator
  (IE won't use a plain-jane .ttf or .otf)

- Chrome for Windows displays boxes sometimes for code points in the PUA:
  http://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=122465



* SCSS: http://sass-lang.com/


------------------------------------
